title: { Cambridgeport / Central Square * Super Nice * Works as 2+ or 3 bed }
posting_body: ['Cambridgeport / Central Square *', 'Super Nice * Works as 2+ or 3 bed', 'Cambridge / Central Square / Cambridgeport', 'Available:', '9/1/2022', '||', '  Fee:', 'Full Fee', '||', '  Reference:', '#172805', 'Apartment Details', 'Location:', 'Cambridge/Central Square', 'Bedrooms:', '3', 'Kitchen:', 'Galley.', ' With dining area.', ' Appliances include:  Refrigerator, Natural Gas Stove, Dishwasher, Garbage Disposal.', 'Fee:', 'Full Fee', 'Available:', 'September 01, 2022', 'Bath:', '1', 'Reference:', '#172805', 'Apartment Summary', 'Recent renovation of a 2.5 bedroom in Cambridgeport / Central Square.', 'This apartment is townhouse style with living room (hardwood floors) and fully modern kitchen with dishwasher on the 1st level and the 2.5 bedrooms (newer ww carpet) on the 2nd floor.', 'There is laundry in the complex.', 'Street parking is easy in this neighborhood.', ' (Reference #172805)', 'Features', '3 Minutes minute walk to Major Bus Routes.', 'Permit Street Parking.', 'Coin-op washer in basement, Coin-op dryer in basement, Cable Ready.', 'Cats are negotiable with Landlord.', '5 minute walk to the T.', 'Contact Information', 'Call:', '857-547-8682', 'Please mention reference #', '172805', 'HUD:', 'Equal Housing Opportunity']
